response.name: Strawberry Tart
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2. On a lightly floured surface, roll pastry to a 1/8-in.-thick (3-mm-) sheet. Trim even with edge of pan.
3. Line pan with pastry. Trim pastry even with edge of pan. Prick pastry several times with fork. Bake for 8 minutes. Cool on a wire rack.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together egg, sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon and nutmeg.
5. In a small saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Stir in egg mixture. Cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes or until mixture thickens and boils. Remove from heat.
6. Arrange strawberries on crust. Pour glaze over strawberries.
7. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until glaze is firm.
